Class OPL_sys

  • java.lang.Object
    • OPL_sys
  • public class OPL_sys
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for OPL voting. OPL_sys is a class that creat for open party list ballot voting type. It must need two other class, which is party and candidate to complete the task. Calculate the quota for each party, if one partyâ€™s seat number is greater than its candidate number, distribute the extra seats to the other party. Finish quotas and allocate seats to party candidates. For any tie in the vote count, a coin flip is used to settle the tie.

    This class has 8 attributes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Chenxuan Liu, Jicheng Zhu

      • OPL_sys

        public OPL_sys​(java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> candidate,
               java.util.ArrayList<Party> party,
               int number_candidate,
               int num_seats,
               java.io.PrintWriter mywriter)
        Constructor, creates new OPL_sys instance.
        Parameters:
        candidate - Candidate ArrayList which contains all the candidates in the election.
        party - Party ArrayList stores all the parties that have joined the election.
        number_candidate - the total number of candidates added to the election.
        num_seats - the total number of seats won.
        mywriter - write into the audit file.
